name.@value: Tracey | The Kitchen is My Playground

description.@value: Are you buying a packaged mix to make beer bread?  Stop!  With just four simple ingredients, you can make your own beer bread at home ~ no mix required.  And one of those simple ingredients?  You guessed it.  It's a beer.

keywords.@value: How to Make Beer Bread without a mix, How to Make Beer Bread, beer bread recipe

name.@value: How to Make Beer Bread: 3 Simple Ingredients + a Beer

recipeInstructions.@value: Bake at 375 degrees for 45 - 50 minutes. Serve warm or at room temperature.
Pour melted butter evenly over the top of batter in the pan. Do not stir.
In a mixing bowl, stir together flour and sugar. Add beer; mix until well combined. Place batter in a greased loaf pan.

title.@value: How to Make Beer Bread: 3 Simple Ingredients + a Beer | The Kitchen is My Playground
